name: Starship Raider
description:
A space shooter game based on games like Galaxian, however this is a 3D game and you are in the cock pit of the raider star-ship. The missions not only put you into battle but you are faced with drones that surround you with force-fields and obstacles. Collect pods and coins to upgrade your weapons and systems.

This version quickly goes from easy to difficult with 25 missions to try out . The actual game will have boss levels, more levels, new ships, and upgraded A.I.

Try it out and let me know of any issues. Be sure to include the creation code and build from the title screen.
